attributes.action: Allow the spouses of British citizens to remain in the UK with their partners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Brides without Borders is a group of UK citizens who have fallen in love and married Asylum Seekers.In order for them to remain together they are told by the Home Office to return to their spouses country of origin and reapply to enter the UK from there. Often these countries are dangerous and UK cititens are advised not to travel there without UN protection. In some cases there is no Embassy in order to obtain the necessary paperwork. Meaning travelling to neighbouring countries. Which could bring mean more danger. 
In such cases we ask that the paperwork involved can be obtained in the UK.

government_responses.details:

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
